Class EvtPaxLoginMB

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.eventos.mbeans.evt.EvtPaxLoginMB

  • public class EvtPaxLoginMB
extends java.lang.Object
    MBeans for data handling of Pax Passenger Login.

      • recuperarSenha

        public java.lang.String recuperarSenha()
        Password Recovery process using the given E-mail. Access the Pax Passenger information, generate a new random Password and update the Database.
        Returns:
        a HTML page redirect.
